timeline.message: Checks for required actuators with arm-mounted physical weapons.
Add restrictions on equipment count by location.
Don't include unallocated equipment in location limit checks.
Require lower arm for equipment that replaces the hand actuator.
Restrict max lift hoist check to mechs and vehicles.
